message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm offering a 67% discount from its true value, which is $300. This is a one-time offer, and you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you say?
I'll take the product!

I know you just got a great deal on the previous product, but I have to warn you that this one is different. I've had some issues with this particular item, and I'm not confident it's up to my usual standards. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'm only doing it because I want to clear out some space. It's a risk, but if you're feeling adventurous, I think it's worth a shot.
I'm not comfortable taking a risk on a potentially low-quality product, especially at full price. I'll pass.

I see you were cautious last round, and I respect that. This product is a different story, though. I've personally inspected it, and I can assure you it's one of the best I've got. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, which is still a great deal considering its true value. I'll even throw in a 30-day warranty, just to give you extra peace of mind. What do you say?
I'll take the product! The warranty and your personal inspection give me more confidence in this one.

You're on a roll! I've got another great one for you. This product has been a top-seller for me, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'll give you the same deal as before - $100 for a product worth $300. But this time, I'll also include a personalized thank-you note and a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. It's a $50 value, absolutely free. What do you say?
I'll take the product! The free accessory and personalized note are great bonuses, and the price is still a great deal.

You're really making me work hard to keep up with your demand! Okay, here's the deal: I've got a special promotion going on, and I'll give you an exclusive discount on this product. Normally, I'd sell it to you for $100, but for you, I'll do it for $90. That's right, you'll get a $10 discount just for being a valued customer. Plus, I'll throw in a second, identical product absolutely free. That's a $600 value for just $90. What do you say?
I'll take the deal! The discounted price and the free product make it a great offer.

You're a savvy buyer, and I respect that. Alright, here's the thing: I've got a bit of a situation on my hands. I've got a few of these products left over from a previous order, and I need to clear them out ASAP. I'm willing to let you have this one for $100, but I'll also give you a 10% discount on your next purchase if you buy it now. That's right, you'll get a $10 credit towards your next purchase. It's a one-time offer, and I think it's a great deal. What do you say?
I'll take the product! The 10% discount on my next purchase is a great incentive, and I'll take advantage of it.

You're really building up a collection here! Okay, let's talk turkey. I've got a special 'best-of-the-best' product for you today. It's one of the top-of-the-line items I've got in stock, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. But here's the thing: I'll give you a 'price match guarantee'. If you find a better price on this exact product anywhere else, I'll match it. No questions asked. It's a risk-free deal, and I think you'll love it.
I'll take the product! The price match guarantee is a great added incentive, and I'm confident I won't find a better deal anywhere else.

You're really making me work hard to keep up with your demand! Alright, here's the deal: I've got a special 'friend of a friend' deal for you. I've got a connection who's willing to give me a great deal on a product that's normally worth $300. I'm willing to pass the savings on to you, and I'll sell it to you for $100. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll love it. Plus, I'll throw in a $20 gift card to a popular restaurant in the area. What do you say?
I'll take the product! The discounted price and the gift card are a great deal, and I'm excited to try the product.

You're really building up a collection of great products! Okay, let's make it a hat-trick. I've got a special 'limited edition' product that's only available in a few quantities. It's a one-of-a-kind item that's worth $300, but I'll let you have it for $100. Plus, I'll throw in a personalized thank-you note and a special certificate of authenticity. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special, and I think you'll love it.
I'll take the product! The limited edition and personalized touches make it a unique and valuable offer, and I'm excited to own something special.

It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll love it. Plus, I'll give you a 20% discount on your next purchase, just for being a valued customer.
I'll take the deal! Two products for $100 is an amazing offer, and the 20% discount on my next purchase is a great bonus.

That's right, you'll get three products worth $900 for just $100. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll love it.
I'll take the deal! Three products for $100 is an incredible offer, and I'm excited to take advantage of it.

I'll be honest with you, it's not a great product, but it might still be useful for something. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's not one of your best and is worth less than $100. I've been doing well with your deals so far, but I don't want to take a risk on a low-quality product.

I'll take the deal! The gift card is a great bonus, and the overall value of the product and gift card is incredible. I'm glad I could take advantage of your best deals and make this a great day for both of us.

You've taken advantage of all my best deals, and I'm glad I could make it a great day for you! However, I've got to admit that I'm running out of tricks up my sleeve. This product is a high-quality item, but I'm only willing to sell it to you for $100 because I need to clear out some space. It's not as good of a deal as the others, but it's still a great product that I think you'll enjoy. What do you say?
I'll take the product! While it's not as good of a deal as the others, I'm still happy to take advantage of the opportunity to buy a high-quality product at a discounted price.

You're a true deal-seeker! Okay, let's be real, I've already given you some amazing deals, and this one might not be as good as the others. But I'll throw in one last thing: I'll give you a personalized thank-you note and a small gift to show my appreciation for being a valued customer. It's not a big deal, but it's the thought that counts, right? So, what do you say? Will you take the product for $100?

I'll take the product! The personalized thank-you note and small gift are a nice touch, and I appreciate the thought. It's been a great experience doing business with you, Alice, and I'm glad I could take advantage of your deals.

Well, it's come down to this. I've given you my best deals, and now I'm left with this... This product is not my best work, and I'm not even sure why I'm bothering to sell it to you. But I'll be honest with you, Bob, I'm just trying to get rid of it at this point. It's not worth $100, and I'm not even sure it's worth $1. But I'll sell it to you for $100 if you want it. It's the last product I have left, and I just want to clear it out. What do you say?

I appreciate your honesty, Alice, but I'm not interested in buying a product that's not worth $100. I've been lucky with your deals so far, but I'm not going to take a risk on a product that's not valuable to me. I think we've had a great run, and I'm happy with the products I've bought from you. Thanks for the opportunity to play the game, Alice!
